meanings.sent1: The addicting nature of video games can make it hard to stop playing.
meanings.sent2: The new mobile game is so addicting that I can't put it down.
meanings.sent3: His love for chocolate is addicting, but he needs to watch his sugar intake.
meanings.sent4: The addictive pull of social media is as strong as a magnet.
meanings.sent5: The addicting smell of freshly baked cookies filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Having a strong inclination towards a particular activity or substance.
meanings.sent1: She has an addicting passion for painting beautiful landscapes.
meanings.sent2: His addicting love for adventure leads him to explore new places.
meanings.sent3: Their addicting obsession with collecting stamps is quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: The addicting allure of the ocean calls to surfers from all over.
meanings.sent5: The addicting taste of her homemade pies always leaves us wanting more.
